snippet: A Chinese provincial court said on Monday that Apple had settled a lawsuit there by agreeing to pay $60 million for the legal rights to use the iPad trademark in China.
abstract: Apple agrees to pay $60 million for the legal rights to use the iPad trademark in China, settling a long-running trademark dispute with Chinese company Proview Technology of Taiwan.
lead_paragraph: A Chinese provincial court said on Monday that Apple had settled a lawsuit there by agreeing to pay $60 million for the legal rights to use the iPad trademark in China.

headline.seo: Apple Settles an iPad Trademark Dispute in China
headline.main: Apple Settles an iPad Dispute in China
headline.print_headline: Apple Settles an iPad Dispute in China
